H0.text: Who became British Prime Minister in October 1922. David Lloyd George

H1.text: Who became British Prime Minister in October 1922. Winston Churchill

H2.text: Who became British Prime Minister in October 1922. Stanley Baldwin

H3.text: Who became British Prime Minister in October 1922. Boner law

A4.text: Upon Law's resignation for health reasons in May 1923, Baldwin became prime minister and leader of the Conservative Party.

A5.text: Baldwin was one of the prime movers in the withdrawal of Conservative support from Lloyd George; he subsequently became Chancellor of the Exchequer in Bonar Law's Conservative ministry.

A6.text: Andrew Bonar Law was Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from October 1922 to May 1923.

A7.text: Law took both jobs on 23 October 1922.
